bug.short_desc: Compile fail of 3.0 beta2 - git repo in last week does go to completion

long_desc.thetext:
In trying to figure out why in thunderbird the INBOX is displayed and accessible for only the time INBOX data is transferring and is not displayed or accessible I tried compilation of beta 2 on CentOS 7.2 The below is submitted only for the record as the compile process does finish on the code from a git cone in the last week.
libtool: compile: gcc -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I. -I. -I./lib -I. -I./lib -DLIBEXEC_DIR=\"/usr/local/libexec\" -DSBIN_DIR=\"/usr/local/sbin\" -DSYSCONF_DIR=\"/etc\" -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -I/usr/include/libxml2 -I/usr/include -fPIC -g -O2 -MT lib/gzuncat.lo -MD -MP -MF lib/.deps/gzuncat.Tpo -c lib/gzuncat.c -fPIC -DPIC -o lib/.libs/gzuncat.o lib/gzuncat.c: In function ‚gzuc_member_start_from‚: lib/gzuncat.c:139:9: error: ‚errno‚ undeclared (first use in this function) errno = EINVAL; ^ lib/gzuncat.c:139:9: note: each undeclared identifier is reported only once for each function it appears in lib/gzuncat.c:139:17: error: ‚EINVAL‚ undeclared (first use in this function) errno = EINVAL; ^ make[2]: *** [lib/gzuncat.lo] Error 1 make[2]: Leaving directory `/root/src/cyrus-beta2/cyrus-imapd-3.0.0-beta2'

If I understand you correctly, you're reporting that this compilation failure occurs in the 3.0.0-beta2 release, but is fixed in git master?
Looking at git history, I'm inclined to agree, so I'm closing this as resolved/fixed. Please re-open if I've misunderstood.
